ygData.subject: RE: Leatherfoot raider cap quest spoiler request
ygData.msgSnippet: Here s an interesting question though, why do they go to the trouble to edit an item that absolutely no one would wear since its no better than leather to be
ygData.messageBody:
Here's an interesting question though, why do they go to the trouble to edit
an item that absolutely no one would wear since its no better than leather
to be halfling only? They go to the trouble to edit an item that is of no
real value since it has no properties, but they can't fix things that are
really broken? What the heck?

Kitasi the perplexed

-----Original Message-----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong [mailto:rokenn@...]
Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 2:30 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Leatherfoot raider cap quest spoiler request


From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>

There are two verisions of the Raider cap. One the the quest version, the
other if gotten by killing Leatherfoot Raiders.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti

>From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Leatherfoot raider cap quest spoiler request
>Date: Fri, 17 Sep 1999 15:07:02 -0500
>
>From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
>
>Well, my initial intention with the warning was based on info I found on
>AllaKhazam's website and I sent out the warning not based on whether I can
>verify the info, but more on a "this info needs to be verified" level
>because I would hate to see you give away another dirk in vain.
>
>In the case of the Order of Thunder medallion that was changed in the last
>patch for example, we learned that there were two separate versions of the
>medallion and I happened to have the one version with AC which was then
>removed with the patch and then restored again the next day. This leads me
>to speculate that IF it is true that the raider's cap has been changed to
>Halfling only, THEN it is likely that there may be 2 versions of it. All
>speculation - but we should verify with info from players who have the cap
>now from before the patch and players who obtain it henceforth.
